page.title: 02MR ROBERT ELLIOT'S DAY
page.content: AT 7.00AM HE GETS UP AND GOES TO THE BATHROOM TO WASH, DRESSES IN THE BEDROOM THEN GOES DOWNSTAIRS TO GET HIS BREAKFAST. HE ALSO LAYS THE TABLE FOR ME AND MY SISTER JOANNE. HE GOES TO THE TOILET AND THEN COMES TO WAKE ME UP. HE GOES TO THE NEWSAGENT AND BRINGS THE NEWSPAPERS HOME THEN HE MAKES MY MUM A CUP OF COFFEE. AT 8.15AM HE TAKES ME TO SCHOOL AND GOES TO WORK. HIS WORK TAKES HIM ALL OVER THE COUNTRY ON DIFFERENT DAYS SO I DON'T KNOW EXACTLY WHERE HE IS GOING. AT NOON HE HAS A BREAK AND EATS SANDWICHES AND HAS A DRINK. AT ABOUT 5.45PM HE COMES HOME FOR HIS TEA. AFTER TEA HE MAKES A FEW PHONE CALLS AND THEN DOES SOME PAPERWORK. AT ABOUT 7.00PM HE PUTS HIS WORK AWAY AND WATCHES T.V. AT 8.00PM HE PUTS PAUL TO BED AND THEN TALKS TO MY MUM ABOUT HIS WORK. HE GOES TO BED AT 11.30PM
